item.title: Reply to 'Sandwiches I ate in 2012. (During September, October, and November I lived next to a Which-Wich.)' on /r/dataisbeautiful at https://reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/comments/15rkzv/sandwiches_i_ate_in_2012_during_september_october/:

item.description:
Reply to 'Sandwiches I ate in 2012. (During September, October, and November I lived next to a Which-Wich.)' on /r/dataisbeautiful at https://reddit.com/r/dataisbeautiful/comments/15rkzv/sandwiches_i_ate_in_2012_during_september_october/:

I eat sandwiches regularly. You need more sandwich intake!
